abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed operation i s a
            single-tranche Poverty Reduction Support Credit (PRSCI) that
            builds on recent reforms completed by the Government of
            Mozambique and supports implementation of the
            Government's Action Plan for the Reduction of Absolute
            Poverty (PARPA). PRSCl will support policies and reforms
            aiming to improve the living conditions of the population by
            promoting growth and employment and also strengthening
            governance and public sector management. PRSCl will also
            consolidate the basis for helping the Government to attack
            poverty in a comprehensive manner. Further single-tranche
            operations (PRSC2 and PRSC3) are expected to follow in FY05
            and FY06.
